name: Quantorus
description:
Welcome to Quantorus, A side view space shooter with a twist. This game takes place on only one screen, but anything that goes off one side, comes back on the other.

You are a little UFO that got caught in a gravity well trying to escape your home planet when it came under attack.

You are the only one left alive.

Your mission: Destroy Frank, the leader of the invading force, and your captor.

How will you do it? Simple:

        W, A, S, D to move

        left click to shoot

        Esc to give up, and be doomed to stay on one screen forever

You can use the distortion of the world to your advantage.

Good luck.

Play in fullscreen for best results.

We made all the art, sounds, music and code. The font used was not made by us, we found it here: https://www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Gameplay.font

Known bugs:

        Exit game button doesn't work on final screen, you'll need to alt + f4
